version_description:
#### Visit our blog for more detailed release notes: agiletortoise.com/blog

- [New] Handoff support. Easily move your current lookup between devices.
- [New] Landscape support on iPhone.
- [Change] Terminology now required iOS 8 or above.

#### Visit our blog for more detailed release notes: agiletortoise.com/blog

- [Fix] Crash attempting to paste and select text in certain settings fields.

Help & Support: info@agiletortoise.com
News and Tips: @terminologyapp on Faceboo

#### Visit our blog for more detailed release notes: agiletortoise.com/blog

- [New] Spotlight indexing of all words in built-in dictionary.
- [New] Built for iOS 9.2, so Safari View Controller can be dismissed by edge swipe.
- [Change] Improv

#### Visit our blog for more detailed release notes: agiletortoise.com/blog

- Only minor under the hood changes and fixes.

Help & Support: info@agiletortoise.com
News and Tips: @terminologyapp on Facebook and Twitter

#### Visit our blog for more detailed release notes: agiletortoise.com/blog

- [New] Previous/Next word buttons to browse through history.
- [New] Remove word from history button now requires confirmation.
- [Change] Visual tweaks to user inte

## Terminology is all-new for 2017! Great new features include:

- All new interface makes it easier and quicker to research terms.
- Share extension, Today widget and more.
- Add user notes to any term.
- New fast, reliable CloudKit-based

#### Visit our blog for more detailed release notes: agiletortoise.com/blog

- **Fix:** Change to search query should scroll suggestion list to top.
- **Change:** Increase some touch target sizes (like home and copy) button for easier access.

#### Visit our blog for more detailed release notes: agiletortoise.com/blog

- **New:** Te:Define menu item allows lookup of text selections in existing definitions or in-app browser. Select text in an existing definition, or in a web page loaded vi
